parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brakes hesitate or fail to engage
the vehicle floats or slides before the brakes engage
the vehicle is difficult to control
especially in rainy or slippery conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The power seat switch catching fire can cause damage to the vehicle's electrical system, potentially leading to a larger electrical fire, and pose a risk to the occupants' safety.
symptoms: Smoke or flames coming from the power seat switch
melting or charring of the seat or surrounding components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The front seat head restraint not being high enough can increase the risk of neck or head injury in the event of a crash or sudden stop.
symptoms: The head restraint does not provide adequate support or protection for the head or neck
the head restraint is too low or does not adjust to a suitable height.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective seat belt design can lead to ejection from the vehicle in the event of an accident, resulting in serious injury or fatality.
symptoms: The shoulder and lap belts are fastened to the same tongue
allowing one person to get in or out of the vehicle when the door is open
and potentially leading to ejection from the vehicle in an accident.
